title: Reuse RPC implementation from extension in TUI
description:
Extract and reuse the RPC implementation from @clive/webview-rpc for the TUI.

## Goal
Share RPC code between TUI and VSCode extension for:
- bash -> rpc -> ui communication
- ui -> rpc -> bash commands

## What's Reusable (from exploration)
- Message types (RpcMessage, RpcResponse, RpcSubscriptionUpdate) - 100%
- Procedure builder with Effect-based handlers - 95%
- Router building pattern - 100%
- XState fromCallback actor pattern for subscriptions

## What Needs Building
- TUI-specific transport (stdio/IPC instead of webview postMessage)
- Adapt hooks/providers for Ink/React TUI context

## Reference
The `regenerate-knowledge-base-actor.ts` pattern in extension already proves this works with XState.
